participant_1.background:
My biggest fear is that my mother will die before I get to tell her how much I love her.
I like listening to folk metal and riding my boat.
my daughters say i am a great mother.
My laptop is a great companion for my outdoor activities, especially when I'm hiking or camping.
I like to have a place where I can fully immerse myself in my fantasy world.

participant_2.background:
I am not sure how much I weigh, but I am healthy and fit.
i enjoy the occasional drink with friends.
I'd brag about the fact that I'm still close to my friends despite all the fame.
I enjoy spending time with my pets, they're always there for me when I need them.
i m allergic to cats.

content.text: Hi! What's your favorite type of music?
Hi! I'm a big fan of folk metal. How about you?
I haven't really heard of that before. What kind of sound does it have?
It's a combination of folk music and heavy metal. It's really cool!
I'll have to check it out. What else do you like to do for fun?
I like to go hiking and camping. I also like to read and write.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I like to go hiking and camping too. I also like to read, but I don't write much.
That's cool! What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read fantasy and science fiction. I also like historical fiction.
I like to read fantasy and science fiction too. I also like to read historical fiction and romance novels.
That's cool! I've never really read a romance novel before.
I'll have to check one out.
